name: Treble Heroine
description:
Treble Heroine is a 2D-Platformer created for the purpose of studying human-music interaction. Step into the shoes of a young sorceress who lives in a world where music is the lifeblood of everything! One day, an evil sorcerer stole all the sounds of the world, but the young sorceress managed to hide the note for the path. Now she is the only one who can move and save the world! Collect all the musical notes to complete the pentagram and defeat the evil sorcerer! If you played our game we wanted to ask you for help with our scientific study, just answer some questions in the questionnaire, thank you!      
For a better gaming experience, it is recommended to use earbuds, especially if they support space audio technology.  TEAM WORK Giuliana Muto Game Designer, Level designer and game programmer Link Ivan Emanuele Cimino Game programmer and level designer Link Claudia Gaetano Comnposer Link Gaia Ammaturo Voice Link
